channel.title: CVE Feed for envothemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for envothemes -- Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-0766|2024-02-28T08:33:11.015Z -- envothemes -- envo%26%23039%3Bs%20elementor%20templates%20%26%20widgets%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the templates_ajax_request function in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.4. This makes it possible for subscribers and higher to create templates.

item.title: CVE-2024-0767|2024-06-04T17:58:49.645Z -- envothemes -- envo%26%23039%3Bs%20elementor%20templates%20%26%20widgets%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.4.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the ajax_plugin_activation function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to activate arbitrary installed plugins via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-0768|2024-06-04T17:58:44.667Z -- envothemes -- envo%26%23039%3Bs%20elementor%20templates%20%26%20widgets%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to and including 1.4.4. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the ajax_theme_activation function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to activate arbitrary installed themes via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
